travel_events.name: Asteroids
travel_events.description: Rocky debris everywhere, maybe from a recent collision?
travel_events.effect: Roll to avoid damage or use Probe Launcher. On failure, take 1D6 Hull damage.

travel_events.name: Navigation Trouble
travel_events.description: Is this place even on the star maps?
travel_events.effect: Lose 1 story point. If ship is damaged, roll 1D6. On 1-2, a random crew member suffers an injury.

travel_events.name: Raided
travel_events.description: Your vessel catches the eye of some pirates.
travel_events.effect: Roll 2D6 + highest Savvy. On 7+, intimidate pirates. Otherwise, engage in battle.

travel_events.name: Deep Space Wreckage
travel_events.description: You find an old wreck drifting through empty space.
travel_events.effect: Gain two damaged items of random type and quality.

travel_events.name: Drive Trouble
travel_events.description: It's not supposed to make that sound.
travel_events.effect: Roll 3 times, needing 6+ on 2D6 + highest Savvy. Each failure grounds ship for 1 turn.

travel_events.name: Down-time
travel_events.description: It's a long time to just sit here.
travel_events.effect: A random crew member gains 1 XP. Attempt to repair one random damaged item.

travel_events.name: Distress Call
travel_events.effect: Roll 1D6. 1: Take 1D6+1 Hull damage. 2: Find wreckage. 3-4: Rescue new crew member. 5-6: Save ship, gain reward or take damage.

travel_events.name: Patrol Ship
travel_events.description: A Unity patrol vessel hails you.
travel_events.effect: Roll 2D6-3 for each of two random items. On success, item is confiscated. Next world cannot be Invaded.

travel_events.name: Cosmic Phenomenon
travel_events.description: A crew member sees a strange manifestation in space.
travel_events.effect: Random crew member gains 1 Luck. If you have a Precursor, gain 1 story point.

travel_events.name: Escape Pod
travel_events.description: You find an escape pod drifting through space.
travel_events.effect: Roll 1D6. 1: Gain Rival. 2-3: Gain credits and item. 4: Gain Quest Rumor and story point. 5-6: Gain new crew member.

mission_events.name: Unexpected Ally
mission_events.description: A stranger offers assistance during your mission.
mission_events.effect: Gain a temporary ally (use Skulker stats) for this mission only.

mission_events.name: Equipment Malfunction
mission_events.description: A critical piece of gear stops working at the worst moment.
mission_events.effect: One random piece of equipment is damaged and cannot be used for the rest of the mission.

mission_events.name: Hostile Environment
mission_events.description: The local conditions are worse than expected.
mission_events.effect: All characters take a -1 penalty to all rolls for the duration of the mission.

mission_events.name: Lucky Break
mission_events.effect: Gain advantage (roll twice, take best result) on your next roll or action.

mission_events.name: Rival Interference
mission_events.description: One of your rivals shows up to complicate matters.
mission_events.effect: Add an additional enemy group (use Rival crew stats) to the current encounter.

mission_events.name: Hidden Cache
mission_events.description: You stumble upon a hidden stash of goods.
mission_events.effect: Roll twice on the Loot Table and choose one item to keep.

mission_events.name: Local Uprising
mission_events.description: The locals are rebelling against the current authorities.
mission_events.effect: Choose to either help the rebels (+1 Reputation, -100 credits) or the authorities (-1 Reputation, +100 credits).

mission_events.name: Time Pressure
mission_events.description: You receive word that you have less time than initially thought.
mission_events.effect: The mission must be completed in half the original number of turns, rounded up.

mission_events.name: Reinforcements
mission_events.effect: Add 1D3 enemies of the same type as the current encounter to the battlefield.

mission_events.name: Tactical Advantage
mission_events.description: You spot a weakness in the enemy's defenses.
mission_events.effect: Your next attack against any enemy automatically hits and deals maximum damage.

post_mission_events.name: Celebratory Mood
post_mission_events.description: The successful mission has lifted everyone's spirits.

post_mission_events.name: Loot Discovery
post_mission_events.description: While leaving the mission area, you find some overlooked valuables.
post_mission_events.effect: Roll once on the Loot Table.

post_mission_events.name: Medical Emergency
post_mission_events.description: One of your crew members' wounds turns out to be worse than initially thought.
post_mission_events.effect: A random crew member who took damage during the mission must roll on the Injury Table.

post_mission_events.name: Reputation Boost
post_mission_events.description: Word of your success spreads quickly.
post_mission_events.effect: Gain +1 Reputation in the current star system.

post_mission_events.name: Gear Degradation
post_mission_events.description: The wear and tear of the mission has taken its toll on your equipment.
post_mission_events.effect: One random piece of gear or weapon is damaged and requires repair.
